org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.name: TABLE FILL WITH LENGTH DATA VARIABLE
org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.functionalBlock:
CLR BYTE_CNT MOV A,#0E8H ;LENGTH DATA CANNOT BE MORE THAN 255 MOV R2,A MOV DPTR,#D2025H ;SOURCE DATA MOVX A,@DPTR MOV R5,A INC DPTR MOVX A,@DPTR MOV R4,A
TABLE_FILL_NOT_COMPLETE :
MOV DPTR,#D2030H ;DESTINATION START ADDRESS MOV A,BYTE_CNT CLR C ADD A,DPL MOV DPL,A CLR C MOV A,DPH ADDC A,#0 MOV DPH,A MOV A,R5 MOVX @DPTR,A INC DPTR MOV A,R4 MOVX @DPTR,A
DJNZ R2,TABLE_FILL_NOT_COMPLETE
